website_summaries.verdict: This British-made helmet offers unbeatable and superior safety, exceeding both U.S. and U.K. standards.
pros: The low profile helmet is good-looking and classic in style
Features include front and rear vents covered in microfiber suede that keeps your head cool and gives it an on-trend look
Sizing is by head size for a more exact fit
Professional styling makes it suitable for all levels of equestrian sport and competition
cons: Despite the ventilation, it’s warmer than some other helmets

customer_reviews.title: Love this helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet! It's much nicer than the other helmets I have owned. There is extra padding and it laces at the back for a better/closer fit to the head. The strap is more comfortable than other straps on my other helmets. The strap is easier to adjust. The bill on the helmet is a bit longer too which gives a bit better sun protection. This helmet also has a better test crash rating which was important to me after I had an accident with a fairly severe concussion. I was wearing a helmet at the time but it did not protect the back of my head. This helmet comes down a bit further.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet! Great price; prompt delivery
customer_reviews.text: Received 11 days after order (from England), brand new in the box with all of the tags. Amazon hasn't figured out that it arrived yet! ASTM 1163-15 certified, exactly as advertised. Love the CO fit. This is a replacement for my old Ayr8. A little snug, but my old one was worn out and rocking forward on my head. Don't be fooled by my husband's name on the amazon account; I am a female hunter/jumper rider, showing at USEF rated horse shows.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Card

customer_reviews.title: Can't Go Wrong with Charles Owen
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet and super lightweight. This is absolutely the best buy out there! Some retailers charge twice as much for these helmets. It fits perfectly true to size as I purchased this as an upgrade from my previous helmet. Very comfortable. Only drawback for me was that it looks quite large on my head, but hey, it's suppose to protect what's in there! Definitely a keeper
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: best
customer_reviews.text: the Ayr8 and Gyr8 are the only helmets that fit my small long oval head! great quality, looks good, I can wear it all day with no discomfort. Does not have the airflow of many cheaper models, but quality, comfort, and style wins out for me.
customer_reviews.author: dawn graham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Got the right size and color, great helmet! Very light and looks great. Shipping took about three weeks but was worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Emma O

customer_reviews.title: Classy!
customer_reviews.text: Sits a little higher in profile than I thought, but super secure and it has vents! Looks classy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Werner

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent helmet. The price from this seller cannot be ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent helmet. The price from this seller cannot be beat. It took a while to arrive, but my order was smack dab at Christmas time. And when I inquired to the seller about delivery, I got an immediate response and tracking information. The helmet itself is classic hunter style for the show ring. I have an oval-ish head and the fit is perfect. However I will note that in some helmets I wear a 7 and for this one the 6 7/8 fits better. Nicely vented for the hot summers too.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Livingston

customer_reviews.title: best helmet I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: the most comfortable helmet I've ever owned. Great price and service!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jesske

customer_reviews.title: Blown away.
customer_reviews.text: The helmet is superb, you can tell right away why this helmet is so expensive. I don't regret buying it at all. Have in mind that depending on the seller, this item might ship from Europe and take a little longer. Don't freak out, it's worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Blanquet

customer_reviews.title: love my new helmet!
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is very light and looks great! Very stylish! the fit is really good and snug! I would recommend this to anyone looking for a nice all around helmet!
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Q.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent helmet. Fits great. Have not had to test for effectiveness (thankfully).
customer_reviews.author: Mancave Racing

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice riding helmet. Vents in top make it a little cooler. Fits people with more of a round head better. Perfect for training rides or showing in.
customer_reviews.author: Seeing spots

customer_reviews.title: Charles Owen's are the best
customer_reviews.text: It's a great helmet as riding helmets go. Hope I don't have to put it to the test. Until then it's all about the looks.
customer_reviews.author: heyjoelle

customer_reviews.title: worth every nickel
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable hat I've worn in 22 years! Bought this model as my best friend would surely be crippled but for this hat saving her brain! Pay the price and ride happy and protected!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn M. Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was excellent as was the customer service from the vendor
customer_reviews.author: Allison doherty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Helmet arrived brand new, in perfect condition, and super fast. My daughter is thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Perfect helmet for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Perfect helmet for my daughter. Best price and the delivery time was amazing. This is my second helmet that I have ordered from this company and I will order from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Terry LeCates

customer_reviews.title: This is my second GR8 and it's really a nice and high quality helmet
customer_reviews.text: Genuine Charles Owen helmet Original tags, package, and registration information. This is my second GR8 and it's really a nice and high quality helmet. Pretty lightweight and a show ring classic.
customer_reviews.author: Joel O.

customer_reviews.title: Product is great but took too long to get shipped
customer_reviews.text: Product is great but took too long to get shipped . Had to buy it at a store instead, pay more and now I'm stuck with two
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl R.

product_meta.title: Charles Owen Ayr8 Helmet
product_meta.description:
With advanced technology to keep you cool, the Charles Owen AYR8 Helmet has contemporary low-profile styling that keeps you looking sharp. This helmet uses the latest in thermoregulation science for a cool comfortable ride. A center mesh-covered panel with 12 ventilation apertures front to rear maximizes airflow and a heat reflective paint finish on silver and gold panel further cools. Fashionable microfiber suede side panels and a gently rounded brim provide an attractive look. A soft leather-look harness with GRpx technology provides a snug secure fit using scientifically-designed grippers. A super-soft interior headband is embedded with silver ions for antimicrobial protection against odors. This riding helmet is embellished with a press-stamped metallic logo plaque above the peak and an embroidered logo in back. ASTM F1163-15/SEI Certified. Imported. Available in multiple colors and sizes.

About Us: Dover Saddlery only offers quality products that they would use on their own horses, so you can have complete confidence in your every purchase. The Dover tradition that began in 1975 continues today - using their understanding of horses and the sport to better serve the equestrian customer.
feature_bullets: Anti- microbial liner with silver ions for sweat and odor protection & prevention
